name: Split Plane
description:
Made on a little custom WebGL game engine.

Use Chrome for the best experience.

Controls

WASD - Movement 

Mouse 1 - Fire

R - Reload

Space - Jump

Left Shift - Walk 

1 - Equip Pistol 

2 - Equip Rifle

Pick up ammo boxes from fallen enemies.

Eliminate all of the soldiers to win.

Headshots do more damage.

Extra Dev Controls

X - Disable Lighting

V - Noclip

This project started as a Quake MDL viewer on WebGL and quickly spiraled out of control into a complete engine. Please forgive us for any jank, especially in the hit detection. In the spirit of old school tech we also load in Quake BSPs created in Trenchbroom. I was not previously familiar with the format, so there's still a bug in the raycasting behavior 🙏.

Lovely sky box from Jockum Skoglund aka hipshot, hipshot@zfight.com

Prototyping map textures are Prototype WAD from Aleksander "Khreathor" Marhall, Khreathor@khreathor.xyz
